root: ^Have you finished helping the villagers, Marina?
^Yes (this option will end the day, you will not be able to return to any uncompleted tasks)

c-0: ^Good! I hope it wasn't too much trouble.
^Take you rest, love. I'll have dinner ready soon.
c-1: ^Not yet, there's still much to do before the day's over.
^Take your time, love. The bed will still be here when your done.
